caption.p: (a) Excitation spectra (λ em = 625 nm) and (b) emission spectra (λ ex = 395 nm) of GdBO 3:Eu 3+ particles obtained by the STR route and RPB route. (c) Integrated area of red and orange emission intensity distribution in the emission spectra of the two samples. (d) Lifetime spectra of the two samples (λ ex = 395 nm).
